description: Visiting the numerous pilgrimage sites of India is an extremely spiritual experience. You can actually avail a holistic retreat by paying a visit to this land of various religious beliefs. Indian Holiday offers tours to various religious destinations such as Varanasi, Mansarovar, Mathura, Dharamsala, Amritsar, Rishikesh, Bodhgaya and Amarnath along with various other destinations for a spiritual experience.
details: Accommodation in Sonmarg for 1 Night with breakfast & dinner
